about.profile: I'm a Computer Engineering student at KMUTT with a strong interest in Frontend Development and UX/UI Design. My passion lies in creating seamless user experiences through clean and interactive interfaces. Currently learning and exploring the world of technology.

experience.description: Focusing primarily on Front-end development with Vue.js / Nuxt.js, working with developers and UX/UI designers to design user-friendly software that enhances user experience.

kmutt.name: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi
